alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 01 at 3:12AM MST until December 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. The strongest winds will occur on ridge tops. * WHERE...The Northern Black Hills, the Central Black Hills and the Southern Black Hills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Southern Black Hills
